xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 6 Ganthagocchaka, Kusalattika » 6.2 Ganthaniyaduka, Kusalattika » 6.2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Ganthagocchaka, Kusalattika
Ganthaniyaduka, Kusalattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
10.
1821Ganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1822Aganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
11.
1823Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ, lokiyalokuttaragamanasadisaṃ.)
1824(Sahajātavāropi…pe…  pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)
12.
1825Ganthaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
13.
1826Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1827(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
14.
1828Ganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1829Aganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (3)
1830Ganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca aganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
15.
1831Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ, lokiyalokuttaragamanasadisaṃ.)
1832(Sahajātavāropi…pe…  pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)
